00017 /**
00018  * The controller itself. Is initialized by the dispatcher.
00019  * @package kata
00020  */
00021 class Controller {
00022              /**
00023               * which models to use
00024               * @var array
00025               */
00026              public $uses= array();
00027 
00028              /**
00029               * which helpers to use inside the view. html is default
00030               * @var array
00031               */
00032              public $helpers= array('html');
00033 
00034              /**
00035               * which components to use
00036               * @var array
00037               */
00038              public $components= array();
00039 
00040              /**
00041               * which views to cache and how long (in seconds, 0=infinite)
00042               * Example: public $cache = array('index'=>300,'second'=>0)
00043               *
00044               * @var array
00045               */
00046              public $cache= null;
00047 
00048              /**
00049               * which layout to use. null means an empty layout, otherwise kata will look for views/layouts/default.thtml
00050               */
00051              public $layout= 'default';
00052 
00053              /**
00054               * render the view automatically just after the controllers appropriate action was called
00055               * @var boolean
00056               */
00057              public $autoRender= true;
00058 
00059              /**
00060               * holds params (get,post,controller,action) of this request
00061                            */
00062              public $params= null;
00063 
00064              /**
00065               * holds the contents of the view+layout after it has been rendered (via render() or automatically if autoRender is true)
00066               * @var string
00067               */
00068              public $output= '';
00069 
00070              /**
00071               * holds an array of variables that are extracted as global variables into the view. add variables via set() or setRef()
00072               * @var array
00073               */
00074              public $viewVars= array();
00075 
00076              /**
00077               * action of the controller that was originally called
00078               * @var string
00079               */
00080              public $action;
00081 
00082              /**
00083               * the absolute filesystem-path to the webroot
00084               * @var string
00085               */
00086              public $webroot;
00087 
00088              /**
00089               * the absolute base-path of kata, slash. append controllername and actionname to this and you have a full url
00090               * @var string
00091               */
00092              public $basePath;
00093 
00094              /**
00095               * the absolute url of kata, including http(s),path and last slash. append controllername and actionname to this and you have a full url
00096               * @var string
00097               */
00098              public $base;
00099 
00100              /**
00101               * string with a pagetitle to render to the current layout ($title_for_layout inside the view)
00102               */
00103              public $pageTitle = '';
00104 
00105              /**
00106               * which view-class to use to render the view
00107               * @var object
00108               */
00109              public $view= 'View';
00110 
00111              /**
00112               * placeholder for the instanciated view-class
00113               * @var object
00114               */
00115              protected $viewClass= null;

00117              /**
00118               * constructor. builds an array of all models, components and helpers this controller (including the ones of the appController) needs.
00119               */
00120              function __construct() {
00121                           if(substr(get_class($this), -10) != 'Controller') {
00122                                        throw new Exception('controller::__construct my classname does not end with "Controller"');
00123                           }
00124 
00125                           if(is_subclass_of($this, 'AppController')) {
00126                                        $appVars= get_class_vars('AppController');
00127                                        $uses= $appVars['uses'];
00128                                        $merge= array('components', 'helpers');
00129 
00130                                        if(!empty($this->uses) &&($uses == $this->uses)) {
00131                                                     //array_unshift($this->uses, $this->modelClass);
00132                                        }
00133                                        elseif(!empty($this->uses)) {
00134                                                     $merge[]= 'uses';
00135                                        }
00136 
00137                                        foreach($merge as $var) {
00138                                                     if(isset($appVars[$var]) && !empty($appVars[$var]) && is_array($this-> {
00139                                                                  $var })) {
00140                                                                  $this-> {
00141                                                                               $var }
00142                                                                  = array_merge($this-> {
00143                                                                               $var }, array_diff($appVars[$var], $this-> {
00144                                                                               $var }));
00145                                                     }
00146                                        }
00147                           }
00148              }
00149 
00150              /*
00151                           function __call($string,$args) {
00152                                        echo "calling $string with ".count($args)." args";
00153                           }
00154 
00155                           function __get($name) {
00156                                        if (isset($this->$name)) { return $this->$name; }
00157                                        echo "getting $name";
00158                           }
00159 
00160                           function __set($name,$value) {
00161                                        if (isset($this->$name)) { $this->$name=$value; }
00162                                        echo "setting $name       to $value";
00163                           }
00164              */
00165 
00166              /**
00167               * loads all models this controller needs
00168               */
00169              function _constructClasses() {
00170                           if(!is_array($this->uses)) {
00171                                        throw new Exception('$uses must be an array');
00172                           }
00173                           kataUse('Model');
00174                           foreach($this->uses as $u) {
00175                                        loadModel($u);
00176                                        $this-> $u= classRegistry :: getObject($u);
00177                           }
00178 
00179                           $this->_constructComponents($this);
00180              }
00181 
00182              /**
00183               * loads all components this controller needs
00184               * @param object $object the class-handle of the current controller
00185               */
00186              function _constructComponents(& $object) {
00187                           if(isset($object->components)) {
00188                                        if(!is_array($object->components)) {
00189                                                     throw new Exception('$components must be an array');
00190                                        }
00191                                        foreach($object->components as $comname) {
00192                                                     $classname= $comname.'Component';
00193                                                     $object-> $comname= classRegistry :: getObject($classname);
00194                                                     $object-> $comname->startup($object);
00195                                                     //FIXME avoid endless recursion
00196                                                     //$this->_constructComponents($object-> $comname);
00197                                        }
00198                           }
00199              }
00200 
00201              /**
00202               * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller. this just calls renderView which does the real work.
00203               * @param string $action name of the view (without .php) to render
00204               * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00205               */
00206              function render($action, $layout= false) {
00207                           $this->output= $this->renderView($action, $layout);
00208              }
00209 
00210              /**
00211               * include and instanciate view-class
00212               */
00213              protected function initViewClass() {
00214                           if($this->viewClass === null) {
00215                                        $viewClassName= $this->view;
00216                                        kataUse($viewClassName);
00217                                        $this->viewClass= new $viewClassName($this);
00218                           }
00219              }
00220 
00221              /**
00222               * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller.
00223               * @param string $action name of the view (without .php) to render
00224               * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00225               */
00226              function & renderView($action, $layout= null) {
00227                           $this->initViewClass();
00228 
00229                           if($layout === false) {
00230                                        $layout= $this->layout;
00231                           }
00232                           $this->autoRender= false;
00233                           $this->beforeFilter();
00234                           $html= $this->viewClass->render($action, $layout);
00235                           $this->afterFilter();
00236 
00237                           return $html;
00238              }
00239 
00240              /**
00241               * render the given view with the given layout and put the result in the output-property of this controller.
00242               * @param string $html raw html
00243               * @param string $layout optional: name of the layout(-view) to render the view into. if false the default layout of this controller is taken
00244               */
00245              function & renderCachedHtml($html, $layout= null) {
00246                           $this->initViewClass();
00247 
00248                           if($layout === false) {
00249                                        $layout= $this->layout;
00250                           }
00251                           $this->autoRender= false;
00252                           // call no before/afterFilter because the whole view is cached and needs no data
00253 
00254                           $html= $this->viewClass->renderLayout($html, $layout);
00255                           return $html;
00256              }
00257 
00258              /**
00259               * redirect to the given url. if relative the base-url to the framework is added.
00260               * @param string $url to redirect to
00261               * @param int $status http status-code to use for redirection (default 303=get the new url via GET even if this page was reached via POST)
00262               * @param bool $die if we should die() after redirect (default: true);
00263               */
00264              function redirect($url, $status= null, $die= true) {
00265                           if(!is_numeric($status) ||($status < 100) ||($status > 505)) {
00266                                        $status= 303;
00267                           }
00268 
00269                           $this->autoRender= false;
00270                           if(function_exists('session_write_close')) {
00271                                        session_write_close();
00272                           }
00273 
00274                           $pos= strpos($url, '://');
00275                           if($pos === false) { // is relative url, construct rest
00276                                        $url= $this->base.$url;
00277                           }
00278 
00279                           header('HTTP/1.1 '.$status);
00280                           header('Location: '.$url);
00281                           if($die) {
00282                                        if(DEBUG<1) {
00283                                                     echo '<html><head><title>Redirect</title>'.
00284                                                     '<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1; url='.$url.'">'.
00285                                                     '</head>'.
00286                                                     '<body>Redirect to <a href="'.$url.'">'.$url.'</a></body></html>';
00287                                        }
00288                                        die;
00289                           }
00290              }
00291 
00292              /**
00293               * set the pagetitle for the current layout
00294               * @param string $n title
00295               */
00296              function setPageTitle($n) {
00297                           $this->pageTitle= $n;
00298              }
00299 
00300              /**
00301               * set a variable to be available inside the view. the given name-string is the name of the global variable inside the view ('bla' => $bla)
00302               * @param string $name name of the variable that should be globally accessible inside the view
00303               * @param mixed $value contents of the variable
00304               **/
00305              function set($name, $value= null) {
00306                           if($name == 'title') {
00307                                        $this->setPageTitle($value);
00308                           } else {
00309                                        $this->viewVars[$name]= $value;
00310                           }
00311              }
00312 
00313              /**
00314               * like set, but assignes the variable by reference (faster)
00315               * @param string $name name of the variable that should be globally accessible inside the view
00316               * @param mixed $value contents of the variable
00317               */
00318              function setRef($name, & $value) {
00319                           if($name == 'title') {
00320                                        $this->setPageTitle($value);
00321                           } else {
00322                                        $this->viewVars[$name]= $value;
00323                           }
00324              }
00325 
00326              /**
00327               * Get a variable that's available inside the view.
00328               * The given name-string is the name of the global variable
00329               * inside the view.
00330               *
00331               * @param string $name name of the variable
00332               * @return mixed
00333               */
00334              function get($name) {
00335                           if($name == 'title') {
00336                                        return $this->getPageTitle();
00337                           }
00338                           if (isset($this->viewVars[$name])) {
00339                                        return $this->viewVars[$name];
00340                           }
00341                           return null;
00342              }
00343 
00344              /**
00345               * shortcut to writeLog
00346               * @param string $what what text to log
00347               * @param int $where where to log (KATA_DEBUG OR KATA_ERROR)
00348               */
00349              function log($what, $where) {
00350                           writeLog($what, $where);
00351              }

00353              /**
00354               * deprecated. use beforeAction() everywhere
00355               * @deprecated 07.01.2009
00356               */
00357              function beforeRender() {
00358              }
00359 
00360              /**
00361               * call this after the controller has been initialized (read: models, components etc contructed) and we are about to call the myaction() method of the controller
00362               */
00363              function beforeAction() {
00364                           $this->beforeRender();
00365              }
00366 
00367              /**
00368               * Called just before the view is rendered. Is never called if autoRender is false
00369               */
00370              function beforeFilter() {
00371              }
00372 
00373              /**
00374               * Called just after the view was rendered. Is never called if autoRender is false. Can be used to manipulate the views contents in the controllers output-property
00375               */
00376              function afterFilter() {
00377              }
